title: Long Drum
description:
A long drum with a tall body and a cylindrical or hourglass shell. Can be used to represent various drums found around the world from Africa to the Caribbean to Latin America to Asia. Types of long drum include (but are not limited to) djembe, talking drum, conga, bongo, tumbadora, atabaque, and dhol.

Can also be used to talk about drums, music, or beats in general.
apple_vendor_description: The long drum emoji on Apple devices is rendered with a rich, dark wood grain texture, showcasing Apple's signature 3D shading and realistic lighting.  Its taut drumhead, depicted with subtle highlights, suggests a resonant and vibrant sound, embodying rhythm and musical expression.  This emoji on Apple devices often signifies a musical performance, a steady beat, or a celebratory occasion.
